short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy marks from Excel and fill the AttalimIMS marksheet with just a paste button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension has been designed to ease the process of transferring marks from an already prepared excel file to attalimIMS marksheet page.

Steps to use this extension - 
1 - Install this extension. (If the AttalimIMS page was already open, refresh the page)
2 - Assuming that, You would already have marks ready in an excel sheet, Make sure that the number of columns and their order matches to AttalimIMS marksheet page.
3 - Select all the marks columns of all the students (only marks, excluding student names and header row).
4 - After copying them, come to the website and click the 'Paste' button displayed besides 'Save' button.
5 - Click the save button to save the entries as usual.
